inputs.question: What did OpenAI announce on March 2023?

outputs.answer: On March 2023, OpenAI announced the release of GPT-4, a large multimodal model that exhibits human-level performance on various professional and academic benchmarks. This model accepts image and text inputs and emits text outputs. SOURCE: https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?search=GPT-4

question: What is the difference between this model and previous ones?
